  • Additional Notes: SUPPORTED SCREEN RESOLUTIONS 3840X2160 | 2560X1440 |1920X1080 | 1366X768 | 1360X768 | SSD recommended | Xbox joystick is default but you can change this by pressing 'S' at the title screen | No mouse compatibility
